entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Adressa wants you to 'do away' with her sister, Queen of the Sayormi, and bring back her sister's necklace. The Sayormi live in the vast forest, placing their wards on trees and preaching about death and gloom. Adressa doesn't know the precise location of her sister. Find the Sayormi Queen, defeat her and bring back her necklace to Adressa.
